Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            void addNotIgnoredPoms() {
          
          
            
                // based on https://stackoverflow.com/a/59888964/8811872
          
          
            
                sh '''
          
          
            
                find . -type f -name 'pom.xml' > found_poms.txt
          
          
            
                poms_to_add=""
          
          
            
                while IFS= read -r pom; do
          
          
            
                    if ! git check-ignore -q "\$pom"; then
          
          
            
                        poms_to_add="\$poms_to_add \$pom"
          
          
            
                    fi
          
          
            
                done < found_poms.txt
          
          
            
                rm found_poms.txt
          
          
            
                git add \$poms_to_add
          
          
            
                git status
          
          
            
                '''
          
          
            
            }
